articles.summary: The U.S. Senate on Wednesday advanced a new version of landmark cryptocurrency legislation backed by Sen. Cynthia Lummis, R-Wyoming. articles.title: Why Banks Are Still Nervous About Crypto, Gambling and Why That Might Change Soon

articles.title: Stablecoin regulation bill easily moves toward full Senate vote

articles.title: Cash will be guaranteed by the Swiss constitution
